trends: There have been no other sightings in Mahnomen
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSleeping in bed - felt something pull on chest. Was pulled out window and dropped over 100 miles away by friend's lake cabin. Hovering 20 -30 feet above the lake was a dark rust colored ship a block long. Witness and others were transported onto ship. Human-looking technicians communicated telepathically with witness. After the incident witness was "zapped" back into bed.
